titleStmt.title: A Sum or a brief collection of holy signes, sacrifices and sacraments, euen since the beginning of the worlde and the true originall of the sacrifice of the masse / translated out of French into Englishe by N. Lynge.
titleStmt.author: Ling, Nicholas, fl. 1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Rouland Hall, dvvelling in Gutter Lane, at the signe of the Halfe Egle and the Key,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
